fields.name: NOTICE_DATE
fields.doc: date and time of notice creation

fields.name: TRIGGER_NUM
fields.doc: string of alpha and digits uniquely identifying event

fields.name: SEG_NUM
fields.doc: Swift serial number (for Swift notice types only)

fields.name: SRC_RA
fields.doc: ra of the XRT bore sight in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SRC_DEC
fields.doc: dec of the XRT bore sight in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: LC_LIVE_TIME
fields.doc: exposure time duration of the lightcurve integration [sec]

fields.name: LC_LIVE_TIME_PERCENT
fields.doc: exposure time duration of the lightcurve integration [%] ????KEEP OR NOT????

fields.name: N_BINS
fields.doc: number of valid bins in the collected lightcurve (0-100)

fields.name: TERM_COND
fields.doc: termination condition of the lc collection process.  The values are: 0 Normal(100 bins),1 Terminated by time(1-99 bins),2 Terminated by snapshot(1-99 bins),3 Terminated by entering SAA(1-99 bins)

fields.name: LC_URL
fields.doc: full URL of Swift XRT Lightcurve

fields.name: MISC_19
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of bits, some bits may not be defined
